name: Ball Breaker!
description:
Ball Breaker is all about breaking blocks with balls using gravity and physics.

Think of Breakout played upside down.

The aim of the game is to keep bouncing and destroying blocks for as long as possible. Simple.

FEATURES
-----------------
Infinite Gameplay (For anyone willing to play until the end of time)
Game Center Leaderboards & Achievements (Because your friends need to know)
Detailed Statistics (For number lovers)
Retro Design (For those who find today too modern)


INSTRUCTIONS
------------------
Destroy the blocks at the bottom of the screen
Tilt your device to affect the direction the balls fall
New rows are added whenever you get to your last block
Destroy coloured blocks before they disappear to get special powers
Keep at least one ball on the screen
Flick your phone back to get more height
